charges.charge_description: Illegal entry after deportation. Penalty: 0-20 yrs and/or $250,000.00 Fine, $100 CVF, Not more than 3 yrs SRT.(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Deft is sentenced to 65 Months Custody of BOP to run CONSECUTIVELY with revocation sentence of 8 months for a total of 65 months; 3 Years TSR; $100 SA, 0 fine. While in prison Deft shall participate in mental health treatment. All standard and mandatory conditions of TSR recommended by Probation are adopted. While on TSR Deft shall not commit any further crimes; Deft shall not possess a firearm or any other dangerous destructive device; Deft shall participate in the collection of DNA to the extent authorized by law; If deported, Deft shall not re-enter the country illegally. Notice of right to appeal advised on the record.
